name: Spartan Digital
description:
Cody Schuldt, founder of Spartan Digital, has over 10 years of industry experience working with businesses of all sizes across multiple industries to achieve an improved web presence for their company. While previously working for some of Houston’s top marketing and web agencies, Cody acquired a variety of skillsets and invaluable experience that he now uses to the benefit of his clients in their business’ marketing efforts.
Spartan Digital was founded to separate itself from the standard marketing agency practices and actually focus on getting results for clients as opposed to simply providing deliverables for a fee. The multi-channel marketing approach Spartan takes insures that the services clients receive are efficient, targeted and effective in producing those results, no matter the industry.
READ MORE...
